title: Child Test Case Validation
description: Implement validation for child test cases that ensures dependent test scenarios execute correctly and maintain proper hierarchical relationships within the test suite.
iWant: child test case validation that verifies dependent test scenarios
soThat: I can ensure test hierarchy integrity and proper execution order for complex test workflows
acceptanceCriteria: Child test cases execute only after parent test completion
Failed parent tests prevent child test execution with clear messaging
Test hierarchy displays parent-child relationships in reporting
Child test results are properly aggregated with parent test outcomes
